main.name: Johannes Muckel
main.description: 7 years of Program Management experience on products of global scale with millions of MAUs
main.bio: A bi-lingual creative spirit with a passion for delivering the best exeriences at global scale. I strive in challgenges and highly enjoy optimizing processes.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts - English Cultural Studies // Bachelor of Arts - English Linguistics
education.description: I started University with one goal - become a teacher. After a lot of soul-searching, I discovered I love teaching and enabling others to do their best, but teaching in a school environment was not for me. I focused my studies onto English Cultural and Literary studies, as well as Linguistics. Being able to speak 2 languages has helped me approach problems from two different angles, as I found that structually you process issues differently in different languages.

work.title: Program Manager
work.description: Working accross multiple value streams delivering Localization for highly-visible products on the PlayStation platform, be it on, or off-console. I am responsible for end-to-end delivery of Localization for all assigned projects, which includes establishing timelines, interactions with design, copy, product and QA, as well as outside vendors. In a nutshell: I make sure stuff looks and reads right internationally, always with the international customer in mind.

work.title: Associate Program Manager
work.description: Delivering end-to-end localizations for PlayStation Network features, from the PS Store to Social Features. I shipped Firmware Versions 3 and onwards with translations and continouous improvements in international customer experience.
